title: Female General’s Code, Fight for His Majesty - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Historical   Martial Arts   Romance   Slice of Life
author: 邻家大姐姐
description:
' Jianfeng... '
' Jianfeng... '

The times of Xiao Lu whisper in her mouth before she slowly opened her eyes has been lost count...

To the girl rescued from the sea, the fisherman Cheng Ai wiped the sweat for her at once while saying 'girl... are you ok? '

Then she opened her eyes slowly, and when she saw this unusual world, she asked, 'hello, where am I, please?'

'You are in the state of Chu... This is Dongyu village... ' Seeing this beautiful and charming girl in front of him, Cheng Ai couldn't help asking,' girl, are you called Jianfeng? You kept calling that name when you were in a coma... '>
